title: Sustainable Smart Packaging
description: Design a biodegradable packaging system for e-commerce with embedded tracking.

title: AI for Predictive Healthcare
description: Build an AI platform for early-stage chronic disease prediction using public datasets.

title: Urban Mobility for All
description: Develop a modular micro-mobility solution focused on disabled and elderly populations.

title: Closed-Loop Bottle Recycling
description: Prototype a city-level collection and processing system for plastic beverage bottles.

title: Privacy-Preserving Edge AI
description: Develop federated learning models for smart home devices ensuring no data leaves the edge.

title: Zero Waste Smart Kitchen
description: Design a connected kitchen system that minimizes food waste with real-time inventory tracking.

title: Resilient Urban Cooling
description: Create climate-resilient cooling systems for urban infrastructure in heatwave-prone regions.

title: Waterless Hygiene Solutions
description: Innovate a compact, water-free hygiene product for disaster-relief and remote areas.

title: Circular City Dashboard
description: Develop a digital twin platform for cities to track and optimize circular economy KPIs.

title: AI in Education Equity
description: Design a tool that uses AI to identify and address disparities in K-12 education access.
